ModMetaData.name: Nature is Beautiful [1.3+]
ModMetaData.author: zhrocks11,Thom Blair III
ModMetaData.description:
Makes most things in nature have either positive or neutral beauty.
Version 3.0 notes: - Updated to 1.1
Version 2.5 notes: By request, now supports RimCuisine: - All fruit trees have a beauty of 5 - All other plants are 2
Version 2.0 notes: By request, I increased water's beauty as follows: - Shallow water: 1 - Moving shallow water: 1 - Deep water: 15 - Shallow ocean water: 5 - Deep ocean water: 25 Added Crunchy Duck's support for the "Impassable Chest-deep Water" mod - If the mod is being used, then Chest-Deep Moving Water has a beauty of 15. - If not, then it has a beauty of 5 Thanks to Crunchy Duck and Oken for their work on this
Version 1.4 notes: The following terrains now have a beauty of 0 instead of 1 to make incentive for man-made flooring: - Dirt (Soil, SoilRich) - MossyTerrain - MarshyTerrain - Gravel - Sand (Sand, SoftSand) - Ice
Version 1.3 notes: - Bug fixes - Now rewritten entirely with XML patching for maximum compatibility with other mods - Rebalanced so there is incentive to smooth walls and floors - Rough stone ground/floors now have a beauty of 1 instead of -1 - Rock rubble has a beauty of 0 instead of -4 - Added beauty of 1 for grass, tall grass and bushes
Credits: zhrocks11 - Update to 1.1 Thom Blair III - Mod idea and programming spd, potatoclip - Programming help Crunchy Duck, Oken - Programming and setting water values
Fully save compatible. Please report any errors.
